Bruno Mars Goes for the Gold With His Magic 2017 BET Awards Performance

He’s a 24K magic man! Bruno Mars kicked off the 2017 BET Awards at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles with a rousing performance filled with electrifying dance moves at the annual…
